Docs.summary: Contains types used in reading and writing Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1) data structures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see [architecture document](https://github.com/dotnet/designs/blob/main/accepted/2020/asnreader/asnreader.md). ## Examples This example shows how to parse a X.509 certificate file: :::code language="csharp" source="https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/blob/main/src/libraries/System.Formats.Asn1/tests/Reader/ComprehensiveReadTests.cs" id="SnippetReadCertificate":::
